name: SolutionsPal
tag_list: michgan-web-develpment, seo, hosting, remote-backup, ecommerce, marketing
overview: SolutionsPal is dedicated to providing high quality work at extremely low prices. We work closely with our customers to ensure that all your needs are met quickly and efficiently and we continue to pride ourselves on charging the same low prices as when the company began in 2000. Although we sacrifice on prices charged to the customer, there is no sacrifice in our commitment to producing work that surpasses that of any other company. Guaranteed satisfaction, which translates into productivity and an improved bottom line, is of utmost significance to us. It is a fact that 100% of our customers return to us for their future projects.
